item.title: 快速开始Envoy-gateway
item.description: https://github.com/envoyproxy/gateway https://gateway.envoyproxy.io/v0.3.0/user/quickstart.html kubectl apply -f https://github.com/envoyproxy/gateway/releases/download/v0.3.0/install.yaml kubectl wait --timeout=5m -n envoy-gateway-system deployment/envoy-gateway --for=condition=Available kubectl apply -f https://github.com/envoyproxy/gateway/releases/download/v0.3.0/quickstart.yaml export ENVOY_SERVICE=$(kubectl get svc -n envoy-gateway-system --selector=gateway.envoyproxy.io/owning-gateway-namespace=default,gateway.envoyproxy.io/owning-gateway-name=eg -o jsonpath='{.items[0].metadata.name}') kubectl -n envoy-gateway-system port-forward service/${ENVOY_SERVICE} 8888:80 curl --verbose --header "Host: www.example.com" http://localhost:8888/get lan@lan:~/server/kind$ curl --verbose --header "Host: www.example.com" http://localhost:8888/get * Trying 127.0.0.1:8888... * TCP_NODELAY set * Connected to localhost (127.0.0.1) port 8888 (#0) > GET /get HTTP/1.1 > Host: www.example.com > User-Agent: curl/7.68.0 >
